title: Lesson Study-Based Program for Developing Preservice Biology Teachers' Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biology knowledge and understanding of educational theory fundamentals
context.additional_context: Customized program for graduate-level pre-service biology teachers. Self-directed learning and peer collaboration environment via LMS

learning_goals: Participants can apply a lesson study process (planning-implementation-reflection) at each stage of instructional design.
Participants can derive biology lesson design improvements through peer feedback and observations.
Participants can revise instructional design strategies based on formative assessment results.

resources: LMS Platform (Including Video Conferencing and Document Sharing Features)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
